name: Ramada Bintang Bali Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Nice pool,handy location,tired rooms
Stay away from this SAUNA hotel!

reviews.text: NEVER STAY IN THIS HOTEL. Better sleep under some banana leaves on the beach. Even if this is last possible option for you in Bali, DO NOT go thre, better stay at home. Avoid it at any cost ans advice all your friend and relatives not to repeat my mistake.
reviews.title: Nightmare on Elm Street

likes.liked: — The moment when I was out

reviews.text: I was so unlucky to find myself in its premicies - I feel terrible still after beeing back.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.text: 1/ Awfully outdated. Worst possible rooms on this planet- fungus and mildew in the bathroom, of all bathroom anemities I found only a piece of soap. Furniture chipped, armchairs stains, non-smoking room SMELLs like tobacco factory. On the walls you can clearly see gekko poo straces. None cared to remove them on regular basis (I complain not about gekkos` presense but cleaning team lack of attention).
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: 2/ Breakfast is a complete disaster. If this so callled hotel management thinks that nasi goreng (only) is OK as morning meal for the guests around the world - I strongly advice them to think twice.
reviews.title: Love The Hotel

likes.liked: — Beautiful yard and connected to the beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3/ Seaside, beach - beyond comments, only profanity. Litter everywhere, polution, used plastic bags, cups, bottles etc.
reviews.title: The best hotel in Bali

likes.liked: — beach front location and friendly staff
likes.disliked: — the ridiculous price increase of the spa treatments.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would highly recommend the Ramada Bintang to all our family and friends. We found the rooms to be very clean every day, and we stayed 10 days! The food from all resturants including breakfasts were exceptional. The surrounding gardens and pool areas were always very clean with people working on them daily. We are headed back there in August for 12 days and only hope our stay was as enjoyable as the first trip there.
reviews.title: Loved the Ramada Bintang!

likes.liked: — It was clean and the service was great.
likes.disliked: — The noise from the entertainment at night

reviews.text: I travel with my family, and we booked 2 rooms with connecting door. This is the worst holiday experience, do not stay there and advice your friend, family or relatives don't experience my mistake.
reviews.title: Worst Experience
Beautiful Family Hotel
reviews.text: 1. Overall hotel out of date, need renovation. The room smells cigarrette and dirty, not well cleaned and maintain. Air cond not working well. Bathroom smells, dirty and they only supplied a soap.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2. Beach quite dirty and the sea quite rough, polution.
reviews.title: Better value elsewhere

likes.disliked: — Not good value, a bit old

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3. Breakfast is good, and they served various food. The quality is average. Room service is overprice
reviews.title: Great
Superb Resort
reviews.text: We spent 10 nights at the Ramada Bintang and found the resort fantastic.

Requested a ground floor room facing the central garden and our room was closest to the pool area but still lots of privacy. Staff were great and could not do enough for us. Plenty of activities provided for guests, breakfasts were fabulous.
reviews.title: Pure delight!

likes.liked: — The staff, the food, the pool, the aircon!

reviews.text: The location of the resort was also good, lots of great restaurants within walking distance and only a 10 minute walk into Kuta.
reviews.title: Don't go there

description: Ramada Bintang Bali Resort sets in more than six hectares of tropical gardens extending down to the beachfront of South Kuta coast referred as Tuban, conveniently located just ten minutes drive from Bali's Ngurah Rai International Airport and within walking distance to the biggest Kuta's Shopping Center. Minutes after passing through Balinese entrance gates, arches and bell tower, warm and friendly hospitality awaits you in a vibrant atmosphere of our newly designed Main Lobby featuring a mixture of natural stone work and acid washed créme marble.
